entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
